rukus.text: [This is] sent down from the Gracious, the Merciful
[It is] a Book with its Verses well explained, [and it is] a recitation in Arabic for people with knowledge
Heralding good news and giving warnings. And most of them turn away and listen not
And they say, "Our minds are immune to what you call us to, our ears are deaf thereto, and there is a barrier between us and you. So you act your way, we do indeed act our way

Say, "Although I am a man like you, it is revealed to me that the Entity worthy of worship by all of you is One and only One. So take the straight path to Him, and ask for gorgiveness of Him. And woe to all those who worship others besides Allah
Those that do not give the Zakaat, and do not believe in the Hereafter
Those indeed that believe and do righteous deeds, those will have an uninterrupted reward
